General.Name: Verney-Carron S.A
General.Description: Verney-Carron S.A. manufactures and sells shotguns and rifled weapons in France. The company was founded in 1820 and is based in Saint-Étienne, France. As of November 4, 2022, Verney-Carron S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Cybergun S.A..

1.Name: Mr. Guillaume  Verney-Carron
1.Title: MD & Member of the Management Board
